messages.messageBody:
Below are two links you might find useful:

Subject: Money and Kids
"Fun With Dollars and Sense"
http://www.easyfunschool.com/article1107.html
Budgeting and learning to prioritize spending are important skills. Rather than being dry and boring, this can be a really fun series of lessons to learn. Here are some ideas, primarily for the older elementary level student, but they can be easily adjusted to accommodate both the younger or the older student.

Subject: Life Science
"Mini Unit Study -- Plants and Animals"
http://www.easyfunschool.com/article1108.html
Plants and animals are a very important part of our world. They are also one of the first things to study when you work on the life sciences. Below are some fun and interesting ways to study this subject.


Kathy in FL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
